alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mellette; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 8:55PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Todd, southwestern Mellette and southeastern Jackson Counties through 930 PM MDT/1030 PM CDT/... At 855 PM MDT/955 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Norris, or 22 miles west of White River, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Norris and Black Pipe around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Corn Creek and Cedar Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT/1100 PM CDT/ for south central and southwestern South Dakota.
